text: Feng Duan (; June 11, 1923 – 15 December 2020) was a Chinese physicist and politician. He was an expert in solid-state physics.Feng Duan , chinavitae.com, accessed December 2010 He was a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences from 1980 until his death. He was a delegate to the National People's Congress from 1983 to 1994. Feng was born in Suzhou, Jiangsu. Feng died on 15 December 2020 in Nanjing, Jiangsu at the age of 97.著名物理学家、中科院院士冯端逝世 享年98岁 ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:21st- century Chinese politicians Category:Chinese physicists Category:Scientists from Jiangsu Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Feng Duan
